text: Lasówka (, ) is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Bystrzyca Kłodzka, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Between 1742/48–1945 it was part of Prussia and subsequently Germany. It lies right on the Polish-Czech border, approximately west of Bystrzyca Kłodzka, south-west of Kłodzko, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 100. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Lasówka
